Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the City of New York, in relation to extending the rent stabilization laws.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution determining that a public emergency requiring rent control in the City of New York continues to exist and will continue to exist on and after April 1, 2012.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Determining that a public emergency requiring rent control in the City of NY continues to exist and will continue to exist on and after April 1, 2012.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the City of New York, in relation to extending the rent stabilization laws.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.

Items.Title: Resolution determining that a public emergency requiring rent control in the City of New York continues to exist and will continue to exist on and after April 1, 2012.
